text: Bidya Sundar Shakya () is a Nepalese politician. He was the 14th Mayor of Kathmandu Metropolitan City. Shakya also served as Chairman of Ward No. 21 for two terms. He is the Province Committee Member of CPN UML Bagmati Province Committee. Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Kathmandu
title: Bidya Sundar Shakya
